name: nutrient supply from ash, from combustion of straw | organic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5 | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22513/documentation

This inventory describes the application of ash, from combustion of straw. This application provides the nutrients of N and P2O5 contained in the ash. No emissions are considered.

Activity starting with the application ash from combustion of straw.

The activity ends with the provision of N-fertiliser and P-fertiliser.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0161:Support activities for crop production

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: inventory based on composition of ash, from combustion of straw
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Dataset based on nutrient content of ash, from combustion of bagasse from sugar cane for fertiliser use

exchanges.description:
The slag produced during straw combustion contains 0,8-2.1% P2O5 and 0,05-0,08% N . (http://www.lcafood.dk/processes/energyconversion/heatandpowerfromstraw.htm)
The average values are used for this inventory.
